summary: This document appears to be pre-trial preparation notes for testimony, likely from a witness. It records the witness's recollections about a call from Jeffrey Epstein regarding a trip to New Mexico involving students, and mentions financial payments related to allegations against Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Called the witness out of the blue about sending 20-25 students to New Mexico; the witness found his calls irritating.

events.title: Call about New Mexico student trip
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein called a witness to discuss sending 20 to 25 students, both boys and girls, on a trip to New Mexico. The witness later felt tricked into sending someone to New Mexico.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein called a witness unexpectedly about organizing a trip for 20-25 students to New Mexico.
The witness understood the trip would include both boys and girls.
The witness later felt Epstein had tricked them into sending someone to New Mexico.
The document mentions that someone received money in connection with allegations against Jeffrey Epstein.
